text:
CM orders water release

Chief Minister Jayalalithaa has ordered release of water from the Bhavanisagar dam from the even number sluices of the Lower Bhavani Project main canal and extension canals and from the odd number sluices of the Chennasamudram distribution canals.

The order follows requests from the farming community. The water will be released from January 13 and this would benefit about 1,03,500 acres of agricultural lands in Erode, Tirupur and Karur districts.
title: Water release from Bhavanisagar
